title: Margot Robbie shows her flair for fashion as the actress steps out in wide-legged jeans in NYC
text:
She's one of the most bankable actresses working in Hollywood today.

And on Saturday, Margot Robbie showed she's also one of the most fashionable, rocking a chic look as she head to New York Comic-Con.

The 29-year-old Australian beauty showed off her sensational form in a pair of high waist flared jeans as she hit the streets of Manhattan.

The look: On Saturday, Margot Robbie showed she's one of Hollywood's most fashionable stars, rocking a chic look as she head to New York Comic-Con

The star of Summer hit movie Once Upon A Time In Hollywood paired the flattering pants with a black Chanel crop top which boasted a wide neck and long sleeves.

On her feet, Margot wore a pair of chunky-soled black heels, and she shielded her green eyes with a pair of dark shades.

The blonde bombshell's wavy tresses were worn loose and swept over to the right side of her head.

She traveled light for the occasion, carrying just a small purse with a gold chain strap.

Blue jean baby: The 29-year-old Australian beauty showed off her sensational form in a pair of high waist flared jeans as she hit the streets of Manhattan

Top of the crops! The star of Summer hit movie Once Upon A Time In Hollywood paired the flattering pants with a black Chanel crop top which boasted a wide neck and long sleeves

Robbie will soon reprise her famous anti-hero Harley Quinn in a spin-off from her 2016 film, Suicide Squad.

Birds of Prey (And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn) is directed by Cathy Yan, with writing credits from Chuck Dixon, Jordan B. Gorfinkel, Christina Hodson and Greg Land.

While her character took flight in the Suicide Squad thriller, Margot recently admitted to Vogue that her violent film was 'definitely less male gaze-y.'

Her new movie hits theaters on Feb. 7, 2020 and she'll reprise her role in The Suicide Squad sequel in the summer.

Look who's back: Robbie will soon reprise her famous anti-hero Harley Quinn in a spin-off from her 2016 film, Suicide Squad
description: On Saturday, Margot Robbie showed she's one of Hollywood's most fashionable stars, rocking a chic look as she head to New York Comic-Con.
